E

execute(Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning.
execute(Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning.
executeInterruptibly(Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning unless the current thread is interrupted.
executeInterruptibly(Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning unless the current thread is interrupted.
executeWhen(BooleanSupplier, Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, first waiting for the guard to be satisfied, unless the current thread is interrupted.
executeWhen(BooleanSupplier, Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, first waiting for the guard to be satisfied, unless the current thread is interrupted.

G

getExecutingThread() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Returns the thread currently executing guards and tasks in this executor, or null if there is none.
getQueuedThreads() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Returns the threads currently waiting for tasks to execute in this executor.
getQueueLength() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Returns the number of threads currently waiting for tasks to execute in this executor.
guardedexecutor - package guardedexecutor
 
GuardedExecutor - Class in guardedexecutor
An executor that executes each task while holding an exclusive lock, optionally waiting for a guard condition to become true before executing the task.
GuardedExecutor() - Constructor for class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Constructs a new GuardedExecutor.

H

hasQueuedThread(Thread) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Determines whether the given thread is currently waiting for a task to execute in this executor.
hasQueuedThreads() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Determines whether any threads are currently waiting for tasks to execute in this executor.

I

isExecuting() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Determines whether any thread is currently executing guards and tasks in this executor.
isExecutingInCurrentThread() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Determines whether the current thread is currently executing guards and tasks in this executor.

P

proceed() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Ensures that tasks with ill-behaved guards, that have become satisfied by events outside of task execution within this executor, do get executed.
proceedWhen(BooleanSupplier) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Waits for the guard to become satisfied before proceeding, unless the current thread is interrupted.

T

toString() - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Returns a string identifying this executor, as well as its execution state.
tryExecute(Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, if it is possible to do so immediately.
tryExecute(Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, if it is possible to do so immediately.
tryExecute(long, TimeUnit, Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, blocking at most the given time or until the current thread is interrupted.
tryExecute(long, TimeUnit, Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, blocking at most the given time or until the current thread is interrupted.
tryExecuteIf(BooleanSupplier, Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, if it is possible to do so immediately and the guard is satisfied.
tryExecuteIf(BooleanSupplier, Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, if it is possible to do so immediately and the guard is satisfied.
tryExecuteWhen(BooleanSupplier, long, TimeUnit, Runnable) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, first waiting for the guard to be satisfied, blocking at most the given time or until the current thread is interrupted.
tryExecuteWhen(BooleanSupplier, long, TimeUnit, Supplier<V>) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Executes the task before returning, first waiting for the guard to be satisfied, blocking at most the given time or until the current thread is interrupted.
tryProceedWhen(BooleanSupplier, long, TimeUnit) - Method in class guardedexecutor.GuardedExecutor
Waits for the guard to become satisfied before proceeding, blocking at most the given time or until the current thread is interrupted.
